#summary About Pokkare

= Introduction =

Pokkare is originally an unfinished personal project, now chosen to be the subject of the practise work of course 581359, Software Processes and Quality, at Helsinki University.

During the course the program will be refactored and developed further as well as tested and documented properly.

The development team, Agileet, consist of Joonas Murtola and Tatu Kairi. A modified Scrum process will be used in development and project management. A total of five sprints, about one week each, will be completed between 10.3.2009 and xx.4.2009.

All documentation as well as source code shall be placed on this code.google.com site.
